subject: Football
Sports Injuries
Paralysis
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay added one of Coach Greg Schiano’s former college players, defensive tackle Eric LeGrand, who injured his spinal cord in a Rutgers game in 2010.
snippet: Tampa Bay added one of Coach Greg Schiano’s former college players, defensive tackle Eric LeGrand, who injured his spinal cord in a Rutgers game in 2010.
